website_summaries.verdict: This option features good high-end clarity at a very attractive price.
pros: Clean, crisp sound at a low price
cons: Wires are small gauge and of bad quality
Some reports of units arriving with parts missing

customer_reviews.title: Unlock all the high notes youv'e been missing
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters are great. They put the oem dash speaker in my Camry to shame. An inexpensive way to unlock all the high notes you have been missing. I had to make adapter plates matching the bolt pattern of original speakers out of stiff hardboard material. Remove any oem filters since these tweeters have their own filters.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They were the missing pieces of my car audio system!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: • Clear High frequency that won't hurt your ears. • Came with a Low cut filter. • Looks very nice on my dash. • Easy to install. CONS: • As of today, May 3, 2018, none found. • I will update this review If I encounter issue(s) in the future.
customer_reviews.author: iBuyGreatGoods

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Great sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Great sound and quality. I placed these on my dash in exhausting holes that didn't come with speakers because of not having that package, but they were a great fit with a template. Just bought 2 more for the rear of my vehicle that I just installed and they look great. Haven't tried that set yet, as I am in the middle of a head unit swap. Between the doors the dash and the rear with my sub, I'm sure it will sound great.
customer_reviews.author: john rocha

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, costs nearly nothing.  Would suggest to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Better than my stock 2019 Civic SI USA teeters. Definitely worth the upgrade but I had to buy the eBay althorn teeter bezels since these do not fit at all. Some 2 part epoxy and hot glue later, they look damn good and sound much better. Overall not to bad but probably more work than they're worth. Still I'm glad I did it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Smith

customer_reviews.title: THESE SOUND GREAT!  EASY TO INSTALL IN MY FORD F250.  Great high performance speakers from Pioneer.
customer_reviews.text: SOUND GREAT! EASY TO INSTALL IN MY FORD F250. Great high performance speakers from Pioneer. I used these as part of a full system using Pioneer products for everything. Simple high quality brand at a affordable price. PROs: -high quality sound -OEM replacement -Built in crossover -great quality materials and wires CONs: -wire's are a bit small 22 gauge I really like these speakers and highly recommend them to anyone looking for great sound for a OEM replacement or full custom install.
customer_reviews.author: Heli Chief

customer_reviews.title: Good for low powered (stock) head units like the one ...
customer_reviews.text: There are solid tweeters. Good for low powered (stock) head units like the one in my subaru. I had Kicker 44KCTs in the car prior and they were too hot, distorted and harsh (perhaps not enough power, or tuned for a different music genre). These are more neutral, not as sizzling to the ear than the 44KCTs. Now ... if I could find something in between these Pinoneers and the Kickers. Overall: good.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: These don't fit easily, I had to take the covers off with ...
customer_reviews.text: I've got a 2000 subaru which had stock tweeters. These don't fit easily, I had to take the covers off with a screwdriver and "jimmy rig" them into place, but with a little creativity, they're secure. That being said, they sound amazing. For $30 I'm very glad I did it. Clean, clear, they make it sound like someone is playing an acoustic guitar in the car with me. The 40W handling sure beats the 3W of the old stock speakers. Clarity improved immensely. Figure out if they fit in your car and then get some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding tweeters
customer_reviews.text: These sounded very good,I bought these and Rockford fosgate at the same time,I choose the Rockfords because the install was slightly easier
customer_reviews.author: james r jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beat sound for price
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my factory dash tweeters with these and the sound is much fuller from high midrange to high sounds like symbols and acoustic guitars. Put them in my Chevy bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The only ones that will fit in modern vehicle dashboards.
customer_reviews.text: The days of installing 3x6 horn piezo tweeters in car dashboards are long gone, so these step up to fill the need for something higher than the bottom of the doors.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Tecza

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2003-2009 Toyota Hilux Surf or 4Runner.
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer TS-T110 is a great tweeter. They need a customized speaker adapters and have to use the existing wire adapters to install on the front door tweeter compartment of 2003-2009 Toyota Hilux Surf or 4Runner.
customer_reviews.author: Milinda Dharmasena

customer_reviews.title: definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: great improvement over my 4 door speaker stock system without any tweeters. definitely improves the high range treble sounds ( as expected ). so noticable i heard certain sounds in songs on the radio that i have never caught before. easy to install too. i just plugged mine in feeding directly off the wire from the front speakers in the door.
customer_reviews.author: Nab Al

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Used them on 2010 Titan, worked great sound great.
customer_reviews.author: thefuzz74

customer_reviews.title: pretty much useless
customer_reviews.text: not made for easy install that's for sure not worth the hassle at all
customer_reviews.author: mylesswan

customer_reviews.title: One happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sounds great, easy to install at a great price. My husband is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Look nice , installed easy but did not hear them yet.
customer_reviews.author: KEP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrade for tweeters!
customer_reviews.text: Love how they sound. Worth the stock upgrade on my Honda Accord. Can’t complain these tweeters are worth every penny. Sounds clear and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Roh

customer_reviews.title: PIONEER TWEETER
customer_reviews.text: THESE HAVE A GOOD SOUND TO THEM AND MADE TOUGH NICE MAGNETS.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT B.

customer_reviews.title: great tweeter worked very well in my 2015 Nissan frontier ...
customer_reviews.text: great tweeter worked very well in my 2015 Nissan frontier dash fit perfect in center hole without any brackets would recommend
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: These things are a No-brainer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I added these to my daughters Jetta and it greatly improved the overall sound quality. These things are a No-brainer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Judge

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get these
customer_reviews.text: Look good and sound great. Somewhat easy to install, would be even better if they included quick fittings.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hui

customer_reviews.title: Great tweeters for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really upgraded the sound in my 2015 Mustang. Great value! Not sure the untrained ear could tell these apart from tweeters costing twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jami L Dohoney

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: These Pioneer tweeters were exactly what my car needed. For those of you who are looking for quality sound without JL audio prices, these are what you're looking for. Easy installation with a 2" hole saw and they look (and sound) fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Seeet
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice set of tweeters running off of the stock speakers. They sound nice and crisp for the money. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaogeyia

customer_reviews.title: Only run these if you have stock head unit power
customer_reviews.text: Installed four of these on a us acoustics 50.4 had 22 watts rms per. Crossed over freq was 3500-25000 thru dayton audio dsp and all 4 blew. Ran off a sq amp. And these cannot take any power
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Wow a big surprise sound is incredible really easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Oswald

customer_reviews.title: These tweeters got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I was selling my car but wanted to keep the high end speakers that were in it. The only problem was that I cut a custom mounting hole for the tweeter and needed something to fill it. I did not care how the speakers sounded just that they fit the hole. Wow, was I surprised when I hooked these little pioneers to the stock radio and they really sounded great! I would definitely recommend these to anyone who wants a high frequency sound upgrade on a budget. The shallow mounting depth also makes flush mounting possible in many locations. Amazon shipping is always fast and reliable!
customer_reviews.author: andrd287

customer_reviews.title: Great product quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This product has great sound and quality for a great price. They’re also very easy to install. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Peters

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for your money you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: mars

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good item, Not cheap like other Pioneer speakers. Bolts nuts and wire included. Nice Sunday project
customer_reviews.author: vince adams

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: They get loud and stay clear. Can’t beat it for the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound with an amp
customer_reviews.text: We have tried a few other brands, but these def are the ones, if you have an amplifier. Zero distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Jo C.

customer_reviews.title: Adds great highs with many mounting options
customer_reviews.text: Adds great highs with many mounting options. they do have in line bass blockers so no additional units needed.
customer_reviews.author: BozSC

customer_reviews.title: Sound really good for $29
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving these 5 stars based on the price to sound ratio. What I mean is – these do not sound as good as the expensive pair they replaced – but for $29 – they sound great! I kept blowing the tweeter on the left side, so I didn't want to spend a lot of money (two hours of troubleshooting and I finally found the cause: the crossover on that side wasn't wired right). Not unhappy with these at all – though if I ever need to replace them – I will probably spend a little more now that my problem has been figured out.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tweeters
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace the TW-600 tweeters and what an improvement. Nice and clear. Too much midrange that was solved by tweaking the crossover. Very clean and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: El Prof

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but wasn't pleased with quality. Although it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: EMELIA THE GREAT

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers
customer_reviews.text: These made my crappy stereo system in my car sound way better. I would definitely buy these again. Great way to add some highs and imaging to your factory radio. I put these in the dash of my Mazda CX5 Sport.
customer_reviews.author: Average audiophile

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. Not an audiophile but cost verses improvement from factory is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: kczar44

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Performance for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced these in my BMW e90 for the stock L7 tweeters. They made a great difference in the sound clarify and the took about the screaming from the speakers. Would strongly recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil T.

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time and as advertised works like a factory replacement glad i didnt pay alot for ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and as advertised works like a factory replacement glad i didnt pay alot for them sometimes i think my factorys sounded better
customer_reviews.author: Justin G.

customer_reviews.title: Eh, they work
customer_reviews.text: They really don't make much of a difference in sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Steven Weschler

customer_reviews.title: Suckw
customer_reviews.text: They are not loud at all. They where a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Maribel maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Cheap replacement, very bright, clear vocals, Didn't last long, few months it stoped working
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Tsing Gar Li Zane

customer_reviews.title: perfect highs I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Made a huge difference in my system, perfect highs I was looking for, and perfect factory for my 3000gt. Sound good. Made my system sound more like surround.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but I’ve had better.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but they are good for starting off a system.
customer_reviews.author: Haleyb01

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great and Low Price.
customer_reviews.text: These sounded great for the price. They did not fit my Jeep's dash as is but I was able to modify the OEM speaker brackets and make them work after a few minutes of custom fabrication.
customer_reviews.author: oppjd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the sound its very good and the quallity is exellent
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Brangado

customer_reviews.title: Great to balance your system not weak or over powering ...
customer_reviews.text: Great to balance your system not weak or over powering loved em so much got another pair one pair on a amp one pair on the head unit both sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Doug R.

customer_reviews.title: Not to pricy but sounds nice
customer_reviews.text: Great sound when paired with a mid bass and crossover setup. Would definitely recommend. A little sharp before break in period.
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: THEY WERE A GREAT CHOICE AND THEY LOOK GREAT ON THE CAR DOOR
customer_reviews.text: THEY WERE A GREAT CHOICE AND THEY LOOK GREAT ON THE CAR DOOR. JUST WANT TOO SEE HOW DURABLE THEY WILL BE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are great little tweeters. They do a lot to elevate the sound stage & balance sound levels. They give you everything you need to hook them up. Super value.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Sound great! easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are great. I have them connected to a component speaker system that came with crappy Tweeters that blew. I replaced with these Tweeters and now the front stage sound is very good!, these speakers were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Smooth sound, soft sizzle.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to do a custom replacement on Rockford Fosgate speakers. I think they sound better than the original rockford tweets! I figured why buy a whole new set of speakers if all I needed was new tweeters. So I did a little custom work on the speakers and they wired right in with no problems. They fit nice and flush and are very smooth sounding. Some crossover control and EQ adjustments and these things are silky smooth lol!
customer_reviews.author: J. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great item went in easy and provides the little bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item went in easy and provides the little bit of extra highs needed for the back of my truck
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Soccorso

customer_reviews.title: not too confident about these
customer_reviews.text: they're just too quiet. i have 2 5x7's in the back of my car, and a 6 1/2" sub under the seat, and these 2 tweeters up on the dash. i found that the sound was semi-balanced at best between the tweeters and the 5x7's in the back. they just don't seem to have enough volume. i'd hate to have to hook up another amplifier JUST for those 2 tweeters but that's about what it woudl take to get the sound i was expecting from them. they're good quality, there is no distortion or anything, just not loud or balanced enough from what i have experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Chibikabra

customer_reviews.title: Good tweeters
customer_reviews.text: When you're thinking that these will help your highs, understand that's all they'll hit. No mids. Definitely no lows. Some vocals are even too low to hear from these.
customer_reviews.author: BDouble

customer_reviews.title: the sound is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound, the performance is very nice and the price is good. I recommend this product. i love it
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Exel sound
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters are delivered excellent Hi freq. sound compare to my EOM. Owned them for 2 months now, sound have not declined. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: HungLowTek

customer_reviews.title: Does fit 2001 Toyota Tacoma sr5 extended cab
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing yesterday> Received by seller immediately. Removes stock tweeter made hole bigger fit right in with parts that came with speakers. Had just replaced front coaxial speakers they blended right in giving me a three way sound beautiful. Old speakers were beat they still worked but no life. I am at piece again now I can enjoy old cd's again. Love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these tweeters and fit well in dash area on my 2012 Frontier. They sound great!
customer_reviews.author: azeaglesfan

customer_reviews.title: Great tweeters
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and clarity, very good for the price.....you wont be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio vega

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, a tad too quiet unless they're staring at you
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My only gripes are the mounting hardware made it difficult to mount in anything thicker than 1/4". Had to modify the mounting plates for 7/16. That and they are a little too quiet. Definitely helped the sound quality but they are still quieter than I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Jared White

customer_reviews.title: Great Tweeters
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my van and these tweeters play super clean and loud . Some of the clearest tweeter i have come across and the look great and come with a few different mounting options and has the hardware to support what ever option you choose. Worth every penny, looking to purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Wilkin

customer_reviews.title: amazing discovery
customer_reviews.text: Amazing clarity, way better than my power bass tweeters.I have one 15" inch sub and along with my inside speakers the overall sound is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: jomar gelin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The substitution of my earlier tweeters with these ones has improved the treble performance of my stereo system .
customer_reviews.author: Premdayal G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tweeters are decent for the price you have to pay. If you just want to improve your factory system, this tweeters are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ragu

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer TS-T110
customer_reviews.text: sharp, crisp highs. handle higher volumes very well. I built an easy mounting bracket with a strip of sheet metal. 4 bends, 3 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Pray for Peace

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this Tweeter, Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: I have a amplifier kenwood, look like ok work and sound very nice. no problem with this item and arrive very soon, in less days.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Flores Durango

customer_reviews.title: Makes my car sound like a moving orchestra
customer_reviews.text: Makes my car sound like a moving orchestra!! Have 4 of these mounted, with 2 6 1/2 kickers and 2 6x9 kickers!!
customer_reviews.author: Caesarsoundz

customer_reviews.title: I like what I hear
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small speaker with a nice sound. Easy to install. And it fit perfectly. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamminj

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I picked these up, improved my sound that I didn't know was missing! I have a pioneer deck and door speakers as well. Never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: A Life Connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the tweeter for my wife's Hyundai Sonata -- it does make a big difference in sound quality and they fit in the exact same place as the original hyundai tweeters. By the way: the original tweeters as well as the original speakers are big piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ciobi

customer_reviews.title: great sound. had to rig to install but sounds ...
customer_reviews.text: great sound . had to rig to install but sounds great .would recommend for sound upgrade not a bose. but your not paying for that.
customer_reviews.author: orlando

customer_reviews.title: Great Tweeters!
customer_reviews.text: Great little Tweeters! Very pleased to have found these. Installed them myself on my 99' Accord in less than an hour. Used a 2" Drill Hole Saw to make the hole and a little bit of sanding after. Connected the wires together with the side speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great!
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my 2008 Nissan Frontier to replace the factory ones, 100% better sound quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Motivator!

customer_reviews.title: ... of the speakers fool you this tweeter sounds much better than the oem and what doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Don't let size of the speakers fool you this tweeter sounds much better than the oem and what doesn't. Speaker came with precut wires made easy to connect.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Stop right Here.
customer_reviews.text: These Pioneer Tweeters are a perfect addition to my 2005 Silverado. Mounted on top of pillar on Cab doors. Sound is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DreamBender

customer_reviews.title: 2002 Avalanche Install
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my 2002 avalanche along with 4 6 1/2 pioneer speakers. They sound great. I had to build a plate to adapt them to my door panel. I just matched my old tweeter up to a piece of steel and cut it out. Then I cut a hole in the steel plate for the tweeter. Then some flat black paint. Turned out nice and looks factory.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Tweeters
customer_reviews.text: Great tweeters to replace the ones in my 1998 jeep grand cherokee, went well with the other pioneer products i put in it
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Just installed, already blew one...
customer_reviews.text: Literally just installed them and one of them already blew, not durable at all, didn't even put the volume on full, had it at 3/4.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to change out the stock tweeters, but they where to big for the space available. I dont have anything against them and if I could find some pioneer tweeters to fit the space provided, would not hesitate to replace them. ONCE AGAIN NOTHING AGAINST THESE TWEETERS, JUST NOT WHAT I NEEDED. So be careful when you ordering, I made the mistake to believe any tweeter would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy.

customer_reviews.title: ... wires that come connected to these tweeters are SUCH bad quality that they ripped while installing on both tweeters
customer_reviews.text: the wires that come connected to these tweeters are SUCH bad quality that they ripped while installing on both tweeters. I HAD TO MELT THE PLASTIC AROUND THEM TO SOLDER THEM BACK TOGETHER MYSELF. Go for a different model or brand if you can afford to
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R

customer_reviews.title: no high end sound/trebble
customer_reviews.text: these have no treble high end sound they are mid range speakers. sound verry hollow my nb2s 7 dollar tweeters sound much better
customer_reviews.author: tobar

customer_reviews.title: SPL was more like 79 than posted amount
customer_reviews.text: Very little sound for the money. SPL was more like 79 than posted amount. Did not install in vehicle but did not return because it took me to long to get to test them after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary the Great

customer_reviews.title: Uh volt meter works but
customer_reviews.text: The dual usb does not. It's wired properly aswell.. I'm jus confused
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Not as specification
customer_reviews.text: It's really substandard item,even it's just an exaggeration on description but totally a very tinny item and complicated even to fix it to the car will be just stress.
customer_reviews.author: Bhaniani

customer_reviews.title: Excellent upgrade and value.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic upgrade in my '05 Xterra front dash tweeters. Easy to install, all hardware included, and superb sound. They almost sound like door speakers now with the extra crisp sound. Superb buy!!! For the money it sounds like a $60 equivalent to a harmon kardon or Infinity speaker.
customer_reviews.author: K. r.

customer_reviews.title: Works w/Pathfinder's Sound System
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these speakers is excellent. My old Nissan Pathfinder tweeters failed. There was no perfect plug and play speakers available except Nissan's for $65 each which were never that good to begin with. Pioneer quality and value put Nissan's Clarion speakers to shame. The very limited space constraint I had forced me in improvise the installation but it turned out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: MelloPi

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Replaced stock tweeters for my evo x that blew. Inline crossover filters out just fine. Too bad I wasted money on a crossover set. Didn’t know these came with built in crossovers. Oh well
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to add to my existing system .. plan on connecting to my front 4way pioneer to make my amp run a 2ohm load.. Came in protected original package from pioneer,, they are as advertised.. I've always used pioneer up top,, to clean up mids and highs,, these should scream as well..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the blown ones in my dash. They work great and I love the built in crossovers. I do not have them amplified other than built in head unit amp. They sound good and are nice and clear. I would by them again.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia Easter

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to after market system
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how awful my factory tweeters were (3rd gen 4runner) until I replaced them with these. I am now hearing high notes from songs I never noticed before.
customer_reviews.author: Illz369

customer_reviews.title: I like pioneer as they been around for many years and ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds alright, but not sure it puts out as many watts as it says it does. I bought a pair of Infinity for back seats of my car and not as much watts and it's way louder. I like pioneer as they been around for many years and used to make long lasting quality products. Just not sure they do anymore. But it seems to be made out of quality materials, so for that they get four out of five stars. Sound quality is good. Could it be better? Yes! But for this price, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: They're legit!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty loud with my amp! System sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: robert saldaña

customer_reviews.title: I use for my Bose 7. 1 home theater ...
customer_reviews.text: I use for my Bose 7.1 home theater speaker system. The tweeter is not loud, but the high frequency is very soft not noisy.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: As described & quality product. Don't forget to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: As described & quality product. Don't forget to purchase a pair of crossovers to interface these tweeters into your stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tweeters for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tweeters for the price. Do a great job at balancing my highs with my lows which are coming from 2 jl audio 15's.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tweeters
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tweeters. Had the $9 ones for a while which were ok, but way too loud and not as crispy. These are much more balanced with my 6.5" door speakers. Only need a little bit of eq tuning to sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great as replacements for the factory tweeters in my Frontier.
customer_reviews.author: Mdawg

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, low cost.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for. Sounds great. Can't really beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: GM6546
